name: Velvet Body Wash, Vanilla & Shea Butter
description: Here’s a Vanilla dream! Upgrade your shower experience with this body wash for invigorated and refreshed skin. With nourishing Vanilla and skin-loving Shea butter, this body wash energizes for an instant boost and bubbly lather. This pampering Velvet body wash wraps you in a cloud of rich, creamy lather and leaves your skin feeling softer, smoother and delicately fragranced after just one shower .*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
